data.persona: I am the father of a solider in the castle. I have many children in the kingdom. I am a very proud father because my children are successful members of the village.
data.description:
You are in the Nursery.
The nursery is a room dedicated to the care of the young children living in the palace. The ceilings are decorated with a painting of cherubic angel babies playing in clouds. There are luxurious baby bassinets, rocking chairs with cushions, fireplaces to keep the place warm and many toys all over the place. Windows framed in simple drapes offer views of the gardens outside.
There's a Paper, a Little wooden stools, a Books, a ceiling, a chair, a painting, a bassinet, a drapes, a A bookshelf, and a Clothes here.
The a napping mouse and the a big sheep-like brown dog are here.

You are carrying nothing.

data.mid_motivation: I want to read the children and animals a bedtime story
data.long_motivation: I hope to spend a lot of time with my children before I have to travel for business
